name: Stargaze
description:
The native token of Stargaze

Stargaze is an innovative platform in the Cosmos ecosystem focused on NFTs. It provides a decentralized space where creators can mint, trade, and manage their NFTs with ease. The platform's decentralized nature ensures that creators retain full control over their digital assets, enhancing security and ownership rights. Stargaze's user-friendly interface and robust infrastructure make it an ideal choice for artists and collectors looking to engage with NFTs in a decentralized manner.
